description: This file declares functions related to property type definitions, including initialization, cleanup, validation, and management of property types within a system.

methods.name: initPropertyTypeDefs
methods.description: Initializes property type definitions from a configuration file.

methods.name: getPropertyTypeDefsCount
methods.description: Returns the number of property type definitions found.

methods.name: destroyPropertyTypeDefs
methods.description: Cleans up and destroys in-memory property type definitions.

methods.name: freePropTypesEntry
methods.description: Frees a property type map entry, used as a callback.

methods.name: isValueValid
methods.description: Checks if a suggested value for a property is valid based on its name, returning a boolean and an error message pointer.
